explanation: [0-0] A woman wearing a beige headscarf and a pink top is cutting a cucumber on a blue cutting board. She holds a knife in her right hand and the cucumber in her left hand. Below the cutting board is a marble countertop with some kitchenware on it. The wall above the countertop is covered with dark brown cabinets.

[0-8] Then a man in a white T-shirt appears in the background. The woman glances at him with the corner of her eye and continues to slice the cucumber. The man takes a glass from the shelf with his right hand and turns on the tap with his left hand to fill the glass with water. The woman turns her head slightly towards the man and continues cutting the cucumber in her hand. After drinking the water, the man puts the glass in the sink and turns around, with only one arm still in the frame.
